com.brightcove.plugin.onceux

Class AdResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.plugin.onceux.AdResponse

  • public class AdResponse
extends java.lang.Object
    Provide a class to encapsulate information about the VMAP (1.0) response from the ad server. This information can be error information or VMAP data bindings and timeline data. The error information will cover VMAP/VAST parsing validity errors and I/O errors. When no errors occur the ad response will contain VMAP data bindings and a timeline identifying which events should happen and when during the playing of the dynamic stitched video. Errors will not stop the playing of the video.
